channel.title: Xbox LIVE - NAT settings
channel.description:
My NAT is at moderate ATM, which means i can only join certain people. I learned how to set my NAT to open, and i did. I tested connection and my NAT was on open, and i could join everyone.
But each time i restart my router, my NAT goes back to moderate, anyone know how i could keep it staying on Open?
I'm on a DLINK router, i don't know the model, but i could find out if it would help.
The rules i applied to make NAT open are still applied, and UPnP still enabled. It was open the first time, so why isn't it still open :|?

item.title: Xbox LIVE - NAT settings
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

My NAT is at moderate ATM, which means i can only join certain people. I learned how to set my NAT to open, and i did. I tested connection and my NAT was on open, and i could join everyone.

But each time i restart my router, my NAT goes back to moderate, anyone know how i could keep it staying on Open?

I’m on a DLINK router, i don’t know the model, but i could find out if it would help.

The rules i applied to make NAT open are still applied, and UPnP still enabled. It was open the first time, so why isn’t it still open :|?
